QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.id odf_pk, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.id as status_report_key, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.id as clarity_status_report_key, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.code as status_report_id, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.name as status_report_name, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.created_date as clarity_created_date, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.last_updated_date as clarity_updated_date, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.odf_parent_id as investment_key, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_cost_effort_ext as is_project_external_factors, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_cost_effort_rev as is_review_approval_problems, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_cost_eft_staff as is_staff_avail_issues, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_cost_eft_status as sr_cost_effort_status_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'OBJ_STATUSREPORT_STATUS_ENUM' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_cost_eft_status) as cop_cost_eft_status_caption, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_effort_exp as cost_effort_explanation, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_key_accomplish as key_accomplishments, (nvl((odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_schedule_status*1),0)+nvl((odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_scope_status*1),0)+nvl((odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_cost_eft_status*1),0)) as overall_status, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_report_date as report_date, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_report_status as sr_report_status_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'OBJ_STATUSREPORT_REPORT_STATUS' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_CODE = odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_report_status) as cop_report_status_caption, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_report_update as report_update, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_sched_milestone as is_next_milestone_on_track, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_schedule_exp as variance_explanation, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_schedule_status as sr_schedule_status_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'OBJ_STATUSREPORT_STATUS_ENUM' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_schedule_status) as cop_schedule_status_caption, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_scope_change as is_scope_change_required, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_scope_deliver as is_deliverable_scope_change, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_scope_exp as change_explanation, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_scope_obj as is_project_objective_change, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_scope_status as sr_scope_status_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'OBJ_STATUSREPORT_STATUS_ENUM' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_scope_status) as cop_scope_status_caption, odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt.cop_upcoming_act as upcoming_activities, dataw_context.language_code, dataw_context.id language_id from odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt odf_ca_cop_prj_statusrpt inner join cmn_languages dataw_context on dataw_context.id = dataw_context.id where 1 = 1 and dataw_context.is_dw_enabled=1
